#summary How to get started
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Requirements =
PHP 5, MySQL 5, Apache module mod_rewrite

= Get PolarBear CMS =
To get PolarBear CMS you need to check out the source through SVN. Please follow the instructions at http://code.google.com/p/polarbearcms/source/checkout.
When a stable 1.0 version exists we will also provide a ZIP-file with all files.

= Installation =
Upload the folder with PolarBear CMS to your server. The folder must be readable from the web.
